data.Title: Reddit Demands Payment From Microsoft, Other AI Companies for Data Scraping
data.Description: Reddit says Microsoft’s Bing, Anthropic, and Perplexity have scraped its data without permission. “It has been a real pain in the ass to block these companies.”

data.Title: Google Implements Measures to Combat Non-Consensual, Explicit Deepfakes
data.Description: Google is making it easier to remove deepfakes and also expands About this image to Circle to Search and Google Lens.

data.Title: Perplexity to Share Ad Revenue with Publishers Amid Plagiarism Concerns
data.Description: Perplexity is launching a program to share ad revenue with publishing partners following weeks of plagiarism accusations 👀 "when Perplexity features content from these publishers in response to user queries, the publishers will receive a share of the ad revenue.

data.Title: Microsoft Highlights AI's Role in Combating Election Misinformation and Deepfakes
data.Description: A new report from Microsoft highlights key challenges, opportunities and urgencies that come with protecting people from the dangers of AI-generated content.

data.Title: Wix Introduces AI-Powered Blog Post Writer with SEO Keyword Integration
data.Description: Wix’s AI will now write whole blog posts for you. You can even choose SEO keywords to litter throughout.

data.Title: OpenAI Rolls Out ChatGPT's Advanced Voice Mode to Plus Users
data.Description: OpenAI begins rolling out ChatGPT's Advanced Voice Mode, initially called out for sounding like Scarlett Johansson after its demo in May, to ChatGPT Plus users "The alpha version will be available to a small group of ChatGPT Plus users

data.Title: Google Tests Placing Ads Within Organic Search Results
data.Description: New data shows Google mixes ads into organic search results in only 0.31% of desktop searches and 0.01% of mobile searches.

data.Title: Experts Say AR and VR Will Benefit from AI Advancements
data.Description: While it may seem like augmented and virtual reality interest has faded into the background as artificial intelligence takes over, experts say AI can actually enhance those efforts in terms of personalization and measurement.

data.Title: Microsoft Testing Generative AI-Powered Search Experience for Bing
data.Description: Microsoft has unveiled a generative AI-powered search experience for Bing, aiming to deliver more dynamic and detailed responses to user queries.

data.Title: Google Discover Now Promoting AI Overviews
data.Description: Yep, it's another way Google could drive users to AI overviews. And Discover could drive a ton of clicks back to the SERPs to view those overviews... For now it's only for Olympic topics, but I can see this expanding to others... Time will tell. :)

data.Title: Apple Plans to Launch "Apple Intelligence" by October
data.Description: Sources: Apple plans to debut Apple Intelligence by October, a few weeks after iOS 18 and iPadOS 18 releases; devs get to test AI features as soon as this week "Even when Apple Intelligence launches with iOS 18.1 and iPadOS 18.1, it will be
